"url: https://axarobd.com/product/ribbed-zipper-high-neck-black/ | name: Ribbed Zipper High Neck Black | description: Ribbed Zipper High Neck Black

This high-neck offers warmth and style with its ribbed fabric and long sleeves. The zipper adds a touch of modern detail while providing adjustable comfort. A versatile piece for layering or wearing solo.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

INFO GUIDE

 	Warmth and Breathability: The high neck provides extra coverage around your neck, keeping you warm in cooler temperatures. The zipper allows you to adjust the neckline for ventilation if you get too warm.
 	GSM: 400 GSM.
 	Comfort and Flexibility: Ribbed fabrics are known for their stretch and recovery, making this garment move with you. This is especially beneficial if you're active or simply want a comfortable, non-restrictive fit.
 	Layering Potential: The midweight fabric makes it an ideal layering piece. You can wear it under a jacket or coat for added warmth, or wear it on its own with a scarf for a more casual look.
 	Style Versatility: This type of garment can be dressed up or down. Pair it with jeans and sneakers for a casual everyday look, or dress it up with tailored pants and boots for a more sophisticated outfit.


 	Note: Color may slightly vary due to photo shoot.

Elevate your style and stand out from the crowd with our latest collection of Men's Panjabi!

Our ''Elegant Petrol Blue Panjabi'' is crafted from high-quality, comfortable fabric that is perfect for any occasion. Whether you're attending a wedding, a formal event, or a casual gathering with friends, our Panjabi will make you look sharp and sophisticated.

 	100% Cotton: Ensures breathability, softness, and comfort. Cotton is a natural fiber that is also easy to care for.

"url: https://axarobd.com/product/ribbed-zipper-high-neck-black/ | name: Ribbed Zipper High Neck Black | description: Ribbed Zipper High Neck Black

This high-neck offers warmth and style with its ribbed fabric and long sleeves. The zipper adds a touch of modern detail while providing adjustable comfort. A versatile piece for layering or wearing solo.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

INFO GUIDE

 	Warmth and Breathability: The high neck provides extra coverage around your neck, keeping you warm in cooler temperatures. The zipper allows you to adjust the neckline for ventilation if you get too warm.
 	GSM: 400 GSM.
 	Comfort and Flexibility: Ribbed fabrics are known for their stretch and recovery, making this garment move with you. This is especially beneficial if you're active or simply want a comfortable, non-restrictive fit.
 	Layering Potential: The midweight fabric makes it an ideal layering piece. You can wear it under a jacket or coat for added warmth, or wear it on its own with a scarf for a more casual look.
 	Style Versatility: This type of garment can be dressed up or down. Pair it with jeans and sneakers for a casual everyday look, or dress it up with tailored pants and boots for a more sophisticated outfit.


 	Note: Color may slightly vary due to photo shoot.

"url: https://axarobd.com/product/regular-full-sleeve-t-shirt-navy/ | name: Regular Full Sleeve T-shirt Navy | description: Regular Full Sleeve T-shirt Navy

This classic crew neck t-shirt is made from 100% cotton with a 220 GSM weight, offering a perfect balance of comfort and durability. The regular fit ensures a flattering silhouette without feeling restrictive, while the full sleeves provide extra warmth and coverage.

&nbsp;

INFO GUIDE

 

 	Regular Fit: This is a standard fit that's not too tight or too loose, offering a comfortable range of motion.
 	Full Sleeve: Provides more coverage and warmth, suitable for cooler weather or layering.
 	220 GSM: This refers to the fabric weight in grams per square meter. 220 GSM is a medium weight, making it a versatile choice for year-round wear. It's generally thicker and more durable than lighter fabrics.
 	100% Cotton: Ensures breathability, softness, and comfort. Cotton is a natural fiber that is also easy to care for.
 	Crew Neck: A classic and versatile neckline that goes well with most outfits.

&nbsp;
